meanings.part_of_speech: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb

translation.Japanese: 張る（はる）：くっつける、貼る
translation.English: To stick: to attach or glue something in place
translation.Persian: چسباندن: چیزی را در جای خود قرار دادن یا با چسب وصل کردن
translation.Nepali: टाँस्नु: कुनै चिजलाई स्थानमा जोड्नु वा टाँस्नु
translation.Indonesian: Menempel: melekatkan atau menempelkan sesuatu di tempatnya
translation.Filipino: Idikit: ikabit o idikit ang isang bagay sa lugar
translation.Vietnamese: Dán: gắn hoặc dán một thứ gì đó vào vị trí
translation.Burmese: ကပ်: သတ်မှတ်ရာတွင် အရာတစ်စုံတစ်ခုကို ဆပ်ရန် သို့မဟုတ် ကပ်ရန်
translation.Hindi: चिपकाना: किसी चीज़ को स्थान पर चिपकाना या जोड़ना
translation.Arabic: الصق: لتثبيت شيء ما في مكانه بالغراء أو اللاصق
translation.French: Coller: attacher ou fixer quelque chose à un endroit
translation.Spanish: Pegar: adjuntar o fijar algo en su lugar
translation.Chinese: 张贴：将某物粘贴或固定在某个地方
translation.Bengali: লাঠি: কিছু একটি স্থানে সংযুক্ত বা আঠালো করার জন্য

meanings.part_of_speech: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb, Transitive verb
Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb

translation.English: to stretch, to form, to strain (could be used in various contexts like stretching a fabric, forming expectations, etc.)
translation.Persian: برای کشیدن، برای تشکیل دادن، برای فشار آوردن (می تواند در زمینه های مختلفی به کار رود)
translation.Nepali: तान्न, बनाउन, दबाबमा ल्याउनु (विभिन्न सन्दर्भहरू जस्तै कपडा तान्ने, आशा निर्माण गर्नेमा प्रयोग गर्न सकिन्छ)
translation.Indonesian: untuk meregangkan, untuk membentuk, untuk menekan (dapat digunakan dalam berbagai konteks seperti meregangkan kain, membentuk harapan, dll.)
translation.Filipino: mag-inat, bumuo, maghimok (maaaring gamitin sa iba't ibang konteksto tulad ng pag-unat ng tela, pagbuo ng mga inaasahan, atbp.)
translation.Vietnamese: căng ra, hình thành, căng thẳng (có thể dùng trong các ngữ cảnh như căng vải, hình thành kỳ vọng, v.v.)
translation.Burmese: ကြိုးစားသည်၊ ဖွဲ့စည်းသည်၊ ဖိအားပေးသည် (အထည်ကို ဆွဲသည်၊ မျှော်လင့်ချက် တည်ဆောက်သည်ကဲ့သို့ ကြောင်းကြောင်း မဟုတ်မဟုတ် တွင် အသုံးပြုနိုင်သည်။)
translation.Korean: 늘리다, 형성하다, 긴장하다 (천을 늘이거나, 기대를 형성하는 등 다양한 맥락에서 사용할 수 있습니다.)
translation.Hindi: खींचने, बनाने, तनाव देने (जैसे कपड़े को खींचने, अपेक्षाएँ बनाने जैसे विभिन्न संदर्भों में उपयोग किया जा सकता है)
translation.Arabic: لتمديد، لتشكيل، للضغط (يمكن استخدامها في سياقات مختلفة مثل تمديد القماش وتشكيل التوقعات وما إلى ذلك)
translation.French: étirer, former, tendre (peut être utilisé dans divers contextes comme étirer un tissu, former des attentes, etc.)
translation.Spanish: estirar, formar, tensar (puede usarse en varios contextos como estirar una tela, formar expectativas, etc.)
translation.Chinese: 伸展，形成，拉紧（可以在多种情况下使用，例如拉伸织物、形成期望等）
translation.Bengali: টানতে, গঠন করতে, টানতে (বিভিন্ন প্রসঙ্গে যেমন ফ্যাব্রিক টানতে, প্রত্যাশা তৈরি করতে ইত্যাদিতে ব্যবহার করা যায়)

meanings.part_of_speech: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb, Transitive verb

translation.Burmese: 張る : လက်လှမ်းမီသည်

meanings.part_of_speech: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb

translation.Burmese: 張る : ထောင့်ထွက်သည်

Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb

translation.English: 張る (To be expensive is one potential meaning, but this verb has various uses such as "to stick, to spread, to extend")
translation.Burmese: တပ်ဆင်ရန် / ဈေးကြီးသော

meanings.part_of_speech: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb

translation.Burmese: ကြည့်နေသည်

meanings.part_of_speech: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb

translation.Burmese: 張る : ထိုးခြင်း၊ ကျည်ခတ်ခြင်း

meanings.part_of_speech: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb

kanji_explanation: The first kanji means to stretch or to put under tension, like making something tight or extended. In the word きんちょう it gives the sense of being stretched tight, so it describes nervous tension. In the word かくちょう it carries the idea of stretching out or expanding, so it marks the sense of extending or enlarging.

explanations.explanation: The word はる means "to stretch" or "to put up" something. It can refer to putting up a poster, pitching a tent, or even the feeling of stretching tightness, like the sky stretching out broadly.
explanations.youtube_description:
Learn how to use the Japanese word 張る (はる) in everyday conversations! 
In this video, we'll explore its meanings, kanji breakdowns, and collocations to help you master this essential vocabulary.
Whether you're a beginner or looking to expand your Japanese skills, this video is perfect for you. Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more language learning content!
explanations.motivation: The exciting Japanese vocabulary word we'll be diving into is はる, often used in various contexts, from crafting intriguing stories to navigating everyday tasks. Ready to explore where and how はる plays a role in real-life situations? Join in to master its usage!
explanations.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word はる are はる and はる. Both have similar nuances, often dealing with attaching or stretching, such as placing items on a surface or putting up things in a visible manner.
explanations.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word はる are ちぢむ and ちぢめる. These words focus on the process of shrinking or making something smaller, as opposed to stretching or expanding.

examples.kanji: 私は公園でテントを張ります。
examples.furigana: 私(わたし)は公園(こうえん)でテントを張(は)ります。

translation.Japanese: 私は公園でテントを張ります。
translation.English: I pitch a tent in the park.
translation.Persian: من در پارک یک چادر برپا می‌کنم.
translation.Filipino: Nag-setup ako ng tent sa parke.
translation.Vietnamese: Tôi dựng lều trong công viên.
translation.Burmese: ကျွန်တော် ဒုက္ခစပ်တို့မှာ ပန်းဥယျာဉ်မှာ တဲထူလိုက်ပါတယ်။
translation.Hindi: मैं पार्क में तंबू लगाता हूँ।
translation.French: Je monte une tente dans le parc.
translation.Spanish: Monto una tienda en el parque.

examples.kanji: ポスターを壁に張ります。
examples.furigana: ポスターを壁(へき)に張(は)ります。

translation.Japanese: ポスターを壁に張ります。
translation.English: I put a poster on the wall.
translation.Persian: من پوستری را به دیوار می‌زنم.
translation.Filipino: Nagpaskil ako ng poster sa dingding.
translation.Burmese: မျှော်လင့်ချက်ကို နံရံပေါ်တွင် ကပ်သည်။
translation.French: Je colle une affiche sur le mur.
translation.Spanish: Pego un póster en la pared.

examples.kanji: 空は青くて、まぶたを張る。
examples.furigana: 空(そら)は青(あお)くて、まぶたを張(は)る。

translation.English: The sky is so blue it makes me squint.
translation.Persian: آسمان آنقدر آبی است که مجبورم چشم‌هایم را جمع کنم.
translation.Nepali: आकाश नीलो छ, यसले मलाई आँखाहरु झिम्क्याउँछ।
translation.Indonesian: Langit begitu biru sehingga membuat saya menyipitkan mata.
translation.Filipino: Napakabughaw ng langit kaya napapapikit ako.
translation.Vietnamese: Bầu trời xanh đến nỗi làm tôi nheo mắt.
translation.Burmese: ကောင်းကင်က ခရမ်းလွန်ရောင်ခြည်ကြောင့် မျက်လုံးတွေ ငေးခဲ့ပါတယ်။
translation.Korean: 하늘이 너무 파래서 눈을 찡그리고 있어요.
translation.Hindi: आकाश इतना नीला है कि मेरी आँखें मिच जाती हैं।
translation.Arabic: السماء زرقاء لدرجة تجعلني أغمض عيني.
translation.French: Le ciel est tellement bleu que j'en plisse les yeux.
translation.Spanish: El cielo es tan azul que me hace entrecerrar los ojos.
translation.Chinese: 天空蓝得让我眯起眼睛。
translation.Bengali: আকাশ এত নীল যে আমি চোখ ছোট করে দেখি।

examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)は胸(むね)を張(は)りました。

translation.Burmese: သူက မျက်နှာကို အဆုတ်မလုပ်ဘဲ မြင်သာစွာ ပြပြီးရပ်ထားသည်။

meanings.part_of_speech: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
